title: NIMHANS Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Project Research Scientist Post
description: National Institute of Mental Health and Neuro Sciences (NIMHANS) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Research Scientist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, MD can grab this chance and apply for the NIMHANS Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply before the last da...
